label: specifiedPackage
comment: A logistics package specified for these transported dangerous goods.
A logistics package specified for this supply chain trade transaction.
A logistics package, at line level, specified for this trade delivery.

domainIncludes.comment: A hazardous or non-hazardous substance which may pose risks to people and/or the environment for which the transportation is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
Agreement, contract, exchange, understanding, or transfer of cash or property that occurs between two or more parties.
